title: SEQALUï¼šFormosa 1867
overview: Based on the novel of the same name, a docudrama about the early days of western influence in Taiwan. Set in 1867 following the shipwreck of The Rover, this TV series will explore how William Pickering and Dr. Patrick Manson helped bridge the gap between American Consul and the aboriginal chieftains of southern Taiwan tribes in order to discover what happened to the survivors of the wreck.
